DOC.HEADLINE: KILLING OF BABIES TESTS DUTCH LAW
DOC.TEXT: Two Dutch doctors who killed gravely ill newborns face criminal trial in the_Netherlands in a test_case of liberal Dutch euthanasia policy , the Justice Ministry said Thursday . One doctor has admitted killing a 3-day-old severely handicapped girl at her parents ' request . Her brain was only partly developed , she had spina_bifida and partial paralysis , her limbs were malformed , and she faced a life of pain . Justice Minister Winnie Sorgdrager ordered the prosecutions to determine how the law applies to cases when a doctor ends the life of a person who is unable to ask_for death . The law requires doctors to show that a patient was terminally ill , in unbearable suffering and had repeatedly asked to die .
